## Timer.reset() method

Resets the timer. If a callback is provided, re-start the clock.

**Signature:**

```typescript
reset(fn?: (timer: Timer) => void): Timer;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fn | (timer: [Timer](./flipclock.timer.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; void | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

[Timer](./flipclock.timer.md)
